title: Pelosiâ€™s Husband Is Gravely Injured in Hammer Attack by an Intruder
description: As leaders from across the political spectrum rushed to condemn the attack, Paul Pelosi underwent surgery to repair a skull fracture.
dc:creator: Kellen Browning, Tim Arango, Luke Broadwater and Holly Secon
media:description: Police and investigators at Speaker Nancy Pelosi's San Francisco residence, where her husband, Paul Pelosi, was attacked by an intruder early Friday morning.
